item.title: 最新消息：一名阿米什孕妇 2 岁的女儿和 3 岁的儿子在家时，他们的母亲被残忍地袭击并杀害：
item.description:
JUST IN: A pregnant Amish woman's 2-year-old daughter and 3-year-old son were home when their mom was brutally attacked and killed.

Read more: https://t.co/kU2xWU1khi pic.twitter.com/iYREuKh30t

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 根据最新公布的法庭文件，一名阿米什族孕妇被袭身亡时，她 2 岁的女儿和 3 岁的儿子都在家，其中 3 岁的儿子还看到了凶手。
item.description:
A pregnant Amish woman's 2-year-old daughter and 3-year-old son were home when she was attacked and killed, and the 3-year-old saw the killer, according to newly unsealed court documents.https://t.co/aPg5E3tMf6

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 有进展据熟悉内情的执法部门消息人士透露，作为纽约南区联邦人口贩运调查的一部分，执法部门正在对 Diddy 的房产进行搜查。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: Law enforcement searches are being carried out at Diddy’s properties as part of a federal investigation into human trafficking being led out of the Southern District of New York, according to law enforcement sources familiar with the matter. https://t.co/Tpd1t4G2Y3 pic.twitter.com/RBseUcRban

item.description:

item.title: 2023 年 2 月从中央公园动物园围栏中逃脱的欧亚鹰鸮弗拉科（Flaco）上个月在曼哈顿死亡时，体内含有大量鼠药，并患有 "严重的疱疹病毒"。
item.description:
Flaco, the Eurasian eagle owl who escaped from his Central Park Zoo enclosure in February 2023, had high levels of rat poison in his system and was suffering from "severe herpesvirus" when he died last month in Manhattan. https://t.co/3nsk9m5xOo pic.twitter.com/YLzJPEdpqw

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在预计供应短缺的情况下，Chick-fil-A 公司在鸡肉中不使用抗生素的问题上出尔反尔。
item.description:
Chick-fil-A backtracks on no-antibiotics in chicken amid projected supply shortages. https://t.co/a8blhjCvLt

item.title: 嘉年华游轮上的一名乘客拍摄到的画面显示，在一场暴风雨中，甲板上方燃起了熊熊大火。根据船上船员发布的公告，所有乘客和船员在事件中都很安全。
item.description:
Footage captured by a passenger on board a Carnival cruise ship shows a fire blazing above deck during a storm.

All guests and crew were safe during the incident, according to an announcement from crew on the ship. https://t.co/cWJf37WjJ4 pic.twitter.com/hOeBuJ4o6x

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 俄罗斯在乌克兰基辅发动的袭击炸毁了一名咖啡师咖啡馆的窗户，她侥幸躲过一劫。这名咖啡师在瓦砾中继续工作，为顾客提供咖啡，尽管她说自己的手受了点轻伤。
item.description:
A barista narrowly escaped serious injury when the blast from a Russian strike in Kyiv, Ukraine blew in the windows of her cafe.

The barista went back to work among the debris and served coffee, despite saying she suffered a minor cut on her hand. https://t.co/dn3pfh27lI pic.twitter.com/AMzm4uSv3Y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 前总统特朗普周一向 @ABC 新闻表示，他将在即将于纽约举行的刑事审判中就向成人电影女演员斯托米-丹尼尔斯（Stormy Daniels）支付封口费一事作证。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 当局说，两兄弟周末到北加州森林郊游时遭遇了山狮袭击，导致其中一人死亡，另一人面部受伤，情况十分危急。
item.description:
A weekend outing to the Northern California woods took a horrific turn for two brothers when a mountain lion attacked them, killing one and leaving the other with traumatic injuries to the face, authorities said. https://t.co/SvkkcOUOau pic.twitter.com/OOeNSMJsHs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 白宫发言人表示，白宫对以色列取消一个代表团的访美计划感到 "失望"，该代表团计划在联合国进行停火投票后讨论对加沙南部拉法（Rafah）的军事入侵。
item.description:
The White House is "disappointed" that Israel canceled a delegation's planned visit to the U.S. discuss the expected military invasion of Rafah, in southern Gaza, after a U.N. cease-fire vote, an administration spokesman said. https://t.co/YkO6MCtJGe

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 19 世纪一场针对黑人企业和一体化市政厅的暴力政变的故事在很大程度上被遗忘，但现在历史学家们正在努力纪念这些受害者。
item.description:
The story of a violent 19th-century coup against Black businesses and an integrated city hall was largely left untold — but now historians are working to honor those victims. https://t.co/ARPEFIrSna

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 成千上万的印度教信徒涌入寺庙，庆祝印度的色彩节 Holi。Holi 标志着印度、尼泊尔和其他南亚国家以及散居地春季的到来。
item.description:
Thousands of Hindu devotees flocked to temples to celebrate Holi, the Indian festival of colors.

item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：法官裁定，前总统特朗普将于4月15日开始接受审判，审理他向斯托米-丹尼尔斯（Stormy Daniels）支付封口费一事，法官拒绝了特朗普提出的延期请求。
item.description:

item.title: 纽约一家上诉法院裁定，前总统唐纳德-特朗普可以缴纳 1.75 亿美元的较低保证金，以支付他的民事欺诈判决。阅读更多
